alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 25 at 2:13AM MST until December 26 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Through 5 AM this morning...additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. For the second Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 18 inches with locally higher amounts particularly across the Logan area mountains and the upper Cottonwoods. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains and Western Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...For the first Winter Storm Warning, until 5 AM MST early this morning. For the second Winter Storm Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 8 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible particularly late Saturday night into early Sunday afternoon. Winter driving conditions can be expected, along with potential traction restrictions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A second winter storm is expected to impact the northern Utah mountains. A band of heavy snow associated with a cold front is expected to produce very heavy snowfall rates Sunday morning into early Sunday afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains
